nodes.text: The Subcom was an Imperial BFF-1 bulk freighter that was present during the Zaarin insurrection.

The freighter was among a large group of various freighters that were used in the evacuation of TIE Advanced Manufacturing Facilities Omar in the Omar system that were Under attack by Grand Admiral Zaarin's Modified frigate Raptor. Thanks to the cover provided by Maarek Stele, the freighter was successful in boarding Omar 1 and evacuating the personnel before the facility was destroyed.
